data.price: Bemeramana! Murahurumbira kwumvira Imana yanyu Rurema Allah n’Intumwa yayo, kugira mugumirizwe akabanga ku vyaha vyanyu ntimubihanirwe, muheze muronswe n’Ubwami bw’ijuru, ubwaguke bwabwo bungana n’amajuru n’isi; bwategekanirijwe abagamburukiramana;
data.arabic: ۞ وَسَارِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرۡضُهَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

data.price: Barya batanga amatungo yabo mu mahirwe no mu marushwa, abatsinda ishavu bakihangana, hamwe rero n’abagirira ikigongwe abandi mu gihe bashoboye kwihora, ubwo ni bwo bugwaneza nya bugwaneza, burya rero Imana Allah Irakunda abagwaneza;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ فِي ٱلسَّرَّآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ وَٱلۡكَٰظِمِينَ ٱلۡغَيۡظَ وَٱلۡعَافِينَ عَنِ ٱلنَّاسِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

dua.name: Dua for Self-Discipline
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine assistance in controlling anger, practicing forgiveness, and maintaining emotional equilibrium.
